sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"附加物，增加物"之意。
means: attachment ：指用于扩大原物用途的附件。
supplement ：主要指使书、报等正广更完善而额外增加的部分。
accessory ：作"附件"解时，与attachment同义，可互换，但还指增加美观的附属品。

word_mean: 〔复appendixes，appendices〕附件：解剖学上常指与某一主要组织器官相接的附属组织或附加部分

sentence.Network_en: We are not certain whether the appendix had already burst or not.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不敢肯定阑尾是否已经破裂。

sentence.Network_en: I have recently had my appendix removed.
This prospect was the subject of an appendix to the development plan.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是发展计划附件的主题规划.

PerfectNetExp.abs: CSS参考手册v4.0.1_web前端开发参考手册系列 ... 媒体类型( Media Types) 附录 Appendix 关于本手册 About This Handbook.

大学英语竞赛本科词汇_百度文库 ... apparent 显然的 appendix n 附录，附属物，阑尾 applaud vt 喝彩，欢呼，.

list.abs: 根据胚胎发生学的分类总共有四种睾丸附件存在:①睾丸附件(莫干尼囊, Hydatid of Morgagni)、②附睾附件(Appendix epididymis)、③旁睾(Paradidymis)、④迷走的哈勒.
appendix clamp 阑尾夹appendix forceps 阑尾钳appendix intestinal clamp 阑尾肠钳，肠夹持钳.
医学翻译词汇一_专业词汇_英文阅读网 ... auricular appendage clamp 心耳钳 auricular appendix 心耳 auricular needle 耳针.
appendix ①附录 ②附件 ③阑尾appendix clamp 阑尾夹appendix forceps 阑尾钳

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in sense 2): from Latin, from appendere 'hang upon' (see append) Sense 1dates from the early 17th cent

entry.def: Your appendix is a small closed tube inside your body which is attached to your digestive system.
An appendix to a book is extra information that is placed after the end of the main text.

means.word_mean: 1. supplementary material that is collected and appended at the back of a book
2. a vestigial process that extends from the lower end of the cecum and that resembles a small pouch

auth_sentence.content: He also responds to the critics in an appendix.
auth_sentence.res_content: He also responds to the critics in an appendix.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He also responds to the critics in an appendix.

auth_sentence.content: San Diego removed a man's appendix through this mouth.

auth_sentence.content: Those actions supported will be added to the list in appendix II.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =expend,表示"花费,支付"; 2. 最初意思为"称重量而衡量……",引申出花费,支付; 3. =hang,表示"悬挂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+able可以……的→adj.可依赖的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+ent……的→adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
im进入+pending即将发生的→adj.即将发生的,逼近的
in不+dependent[adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的]→不依靠[别的人,事或物]
pend悬挂+ing正……的→悬挂之中→即将发生的
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的
append[v.附加,添加,悬挂]+ix表名词→n.附录,附属物;阑尾,盲肠
pend悬挂+ulum东西→挂着[摆动]的东西→钟摆
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 花费, 消耗, 用尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: s+pend花费,支付→v.花费, 消耗, 用尽 v.度过, 消磨
ap加强动作+pend悬挂→挂上去→悬挂
de下+pend悬挂→附属于另一物件
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂

sentences.en: I have recently had my appendix removed.

jushi.english: I have recently had my appendix removed.
